dmca.title: DMCA ISP Notification Letter - JVC/Thenewconnection.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Ivonne Gomez [mailto:Ivonne@NetEnforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2006 12:01 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com
Cc: privacy@thenewconnection.com
Subject: DMCA ISP Notification Letter - JVC/Thenewconnection.com



 

April 20, 2006

SENT VIA Certified Mail
  Return Receipt Requested

70060100000209330870

 

Designated Agent

George Poletes

1333 Stemmons Pkwy Ste 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Re:       Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property 

To Whom It May Concern:

This office is authorized to act on behalf of JVC in this matter.

This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
